name: The Voice of Dingding Ye
body:
### Welcome to The Voice of 'Dingding Ye'.

Hey, I'm Dingding Ye, a father, son, husband and also Co-Founder of the Pragmatic.ly team.

```
$ Robot.new('yedingding').say(['tech', 'life', 'fun'])
```

### Personal Info

* **Email:** yedingding@gmail.com
* **Twitter:** https://github.com/yedingding

* **FaceBook:** https://facebook.com/yedingding
